resources.string:
What"'"s new in this release
 
 Direct paging support with Active911.com is getting really close. Good chance it will be rolled out next week. CodeMessaging.net support is coming along.
 
 New Locations:
 Dooly County and others in GA
 Howard County, IN
 Brown County, OH
 Clackamas County, OR
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Anne Arundel County, MD
 Oneida County, NY
 Orange County, NY
 Lincoln County, NC
 Rowan County, NC
 Stanly County, NC
 Franklin County, VA
